channel.title: Deep Learning on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Microsoft’s AI Chief Says Machine Consciousness Is an 'Illusion'
item.description: Mustafa Suleyman says that designing AI systems to exceed human intelligence—and to mimic behavior that suggests consciousness—would be “dangerous and misguided.”

item.title: Microsoft’s AI Chief Says Machine Consciousness Is an 'Illusion'
item.description: Mustafa Suleyman says that designing AI systems to exceed human intelligence—and to mimic behavior that suggests consciousness—would be “dangerous and misguided.”

item.title: The United Arab Emirates Releases a Tiny But Powerful AI Model
item.description: K2 Think compares well with reasoning models from OpenAI and DeepSeek but is smaller and more efficient, say researchers based in Abu Dhabi.

item.title: The United Arab Emirates Releases a Tiny But Powerful AI Model
item.description: K2 Think compares well with reasoning models from OpenAI and DeepSeek but is smaller and more efficient, say researchers based in Abu Dhabi.

item.title: Sam Altman Says ChatGPT Is on Track to Out-Talk Humanity
item.description: The OpenAI CEO addressed GPT-5 backlash, the AI bubble—and why he’s willing to spend trillions of dollars to win.

item.title: Sam Altman Says ChatGPT Is on Track to Out-Talk Humanity
item.description: The OpenAI CEO addressed GPT-5 backlash, the AI bubble—and why he’s willing to spend trillions of dollars to win.

item.title: Why You Can’t Trust a Chatbot to Talk About Itself
item.description: Anytime you expect AI to be self-aware, you’re in for disappointment. That’s just not how it works.

item.title: Why You Can’t Trust a Chatbot to Talk About Itself
item.description: Anytime you expect AI to be self-aware, you’re in for disappointment. That’s just not how it works.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.
